message_1: Using the Rail fence cipher technique, encrypt the message "MEET ME AFTER SCHOOL" with 3 rails.
message_2:
To encrypt the message "MEET ME AFTER SCHOOL" using the Rail Fence cipher with 3 rails, we first write the message in a zigzag pattern along the rails:

M . . . E . . . T . . . M . . . E
. E . T . M . A . T . R . S . H .
. . E . . . . . F . . . . . C . .

Now, we read the message along the rails from top to bottom, left to right:

M E T M E E T M A T R S H E F C

So, the encrypted message is: "METMEETMATRSHEFC".
